positions.comment: We are now at the Island of Raiatea.
We are now at Bora Bora, the most beautiful lagoon in the world.
We are enroute from Bora Bora to Suwarrow, Cook Islands.
We are 300 miles from Suwarrow, Cook Islands.
We are 300 miles from Suwarrow, Cook Islands.
We are at Suwarrow Atoll, Cook Islands.
We are underway about 70 miles from Pago Pago, American Samoa.
We are 40 miles due East of Pago Pago.
Talofa.  We are at Pago Pago Harbor.
